TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi BindingCollectionEnumerator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
[<System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")>]

summary.span: 支持在从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中对绑定集合进行简单迭代。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a binding collection in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序升级到 Visual Basic 时， `BindingCollectionEnumerator` 将创建一个以启用 `ADO` 相关的代码。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Current { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取绑定集合中的当前元素。

span.span: Gets the current element in the binding collection.
The current element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序升级到 Visual Basic 时， `BindingCollectionEnumerator` 将创建一个以启用 `ADO` 相关的代码。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

abstract member MoveNext : unit -> bool override this.MoveNext : unit -> bool

summary.span: 将枚举数推进到集合的下一个元素。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

returns.span: 如果枚举数已成功地推进到下一个元素，则为 ；如果枚举数传递到集合的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序升级到 Visual Basic 时， `BindingCollectionEnumerator` 将创建一个以启用 `ADO` 相关的代码。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

summary.span: 将枚举数设置为其初始位置，该位置位于集合中第一个元素之前。

span.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序升级到 Visual Basic 时， `BindingCollectionEnumerator` 将创建一个以启用 `ADO` 相关的代码。When an application is upgraded to Visual Basic, a `BindingCollectionEnumerator` is created to enable the `ADO`-related code. > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
